attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: My phone has a bug now because of this app.. It keeps getting updates about some orange dude ruining our country?? For sure would give 0 stars if I could

attributes.title: Tik tok✌🏾
attributes.review: This app is terrible. Shouldn’t be able to buy it in the first place. Waste of time. Don’t get this app. Not worth it at all. It is slow and it makes my phone go slow as well.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: hello, i got this app bc i support our wonderful ✨president🥵✨but the second i downloaded this app my phone began to glitch even if i didn't have the app opened it is very obnoxious and i don't recommend anyone to get this app🤮🤮

attributes.title: App almost as bad as 2020
attributes.review: This app failed to start, failed to satisfy, and just failed overall. I’m sorry I downloaded this app at all in the first place. There was nothing helpful at all about it!

attributes.title: ✨terrible✨
attributes.review:
zero stars!!!! worst app and most awful experience i’ve ever had with an app!!!1!!!
right when i opened it this GIANT man with orange spray paint created an UNCOMFORTABLE and NASTY experience for me and my home gurl!!!!!!! never download unless it’s to rid the world of this man and this image.

attributes.title: stan loona for clear skin xx
attributes.review: man this app had so many errors and my dyslexia even worse !!!! everything was unorganized and didnt make sense at all. what the heck dude💔💔💔💔💔💔😭😭😭😭😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿 i feel like I got scammed fr all I wanted was to get the app and see annoying orange talk 😔💔

attributes.title: no
attributes.review: everytime I opened the app the great ✨orange✨ would come and make sure I was looking at it, if I tried to leave the app he would threaten my life. dont download unless you want the same thing!!!!!! stay safe!!!!!!!!!! 🥺😔🥺😔🥵😔🥺😔😔🥺😔🥺😔🥺😔🥺🥵

attributes.title: Selener 💖✨💅🏽🤩
attributes.review: I downloaded and wanted to see what the app was all about but it crashed and blacked my phone out for a bit, i dont like donald so i hope this app is taken down for almost killing my phone 😤😤

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: Very difficult user interface. Not sure how to navigate app. Some person’s orange face is everywhere and I’m not sure how to actually get rid of it. Very confused. 0/10 would recommend. :(

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS!!!
attributes.review: ABSOLUTELY DONT DOWNLOAD!!! I downloaded this app the support my just ever so loving president however, when I opened the app I was greeted with a horrible sight 😰 it was a Cheeto dust Oompa Loompa, not only that but it wanted my mobile telephone Devices number which I think is a little fishy....😶
